ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp

Class ClaimantExpenseListActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp.ClaimantExpenseListActivity

  • public class ClaimantExpenseListActivity
extends Activity
    View for showing the expense items of a chosen claim Allows navigation to add/edit expense items Allows claimants to submit claims, as well as view comments from approvers

      The onClick method for the button that allows the claimant to view comments attached to a claim Navigates to the comment view activity

      void onSubmitClick(View v)
      The onClick for the submit button Shows a warning dialog if the claim or expense is incomplete Redirects to the function within the ClaimListController
